name: ATC Operations - Paris
description:
Control departing and arriving aircraft safely to their designated airports. Watch out for difficult weather.
This Paris ATC simulation game puts you in the ATC control tower!

Included airports:
-Charles de Gaulle airport (CDG/LFPG)
-Orly airport (ORY/LFPO)
-Le Bourget (LBG/LFPB)
